lexUnit.name: squat.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: short or low, and disproportionately broad or wide.

sentence.text: He was a squat muscular man with freckled brown skin , strong arms and dry sand-coloured palms that made rasping sounds when he rubbed them together .
Don was short and squat and unpleasing of countenance .
He was a squat , muscular figure in baggy cotton shirt and trousers with a turban , a check scarf and a mud-coloured woollen blanket , called a pattu , around his shoulders .
" He was very short and squat and had bandy legs from always sitting on a horse .
Margaret Jourdain was squat , broad , and plain .
Bryony was squat with a cropped bristly head , reminding Carolyn of a wrestler on television .

She was a squat , dusty-looking woman on the threshold of sixty , who had been taken on in the library during the war and whom Mervyn had tried unsuccessfully to dislodge ever since he had become librarian .
One day , she ran a mile or more after him , seeing only that stubby squat little figure going through traffic lights , ignoring cars that hooted and people who screamed warnings at him .
With a feeling of doom I hurried after the squat figure back into the yard where another lad stood by the side of a beautiful chestnut filly .
The door opened and he stood there , staring at her , a squat little old man in shirt-sleeves and braces , a cap set on his head .
A short , squat man with piercing eyes and no hair answered the door .
A squat chunky man whose face was stitched by tiny red veins , his head rested on his shoulders like a box on a shelf , and the rasp of his voice could drill through any argument .
That was certainly the impression he gave to Taheb 's gatekeeper , a squat man with one wall-eye , who appraised him pessimistically with the other when he asked for the mistress of the house .
A door opened further along the passage and to Devlin 's astonishment , Hitler emerged followed by a broad , rather squat man in a nondescript uniform .
As he entered the dining room the gong was just being sounded by a squat elderly women who later proved to be Frau Zimmerman , wife of the proprietor .
` I lost my virginity twenty years ago , " a squat , blonde woman under a hot shower was shrieking .
